comment: I took him for EDG3112. Iv come across my share of bad professors but lord does he take the crown. You would learn more on your own. He teaches absolutelly nothing and just assigns a part from the book. I have gained nothing from his class. He loves to give out zeros if you dont to everything exactly how he wants regardless of what the book says.

Took for Graphics 2 online and he did not teach at all. Just tells you to reach these chapters and do these assignments with very little instruction. He then proceeds to be a very harsh grader. I have sent 10+ emails asking questions and never got a response. Take anyone else if possible since I had to learn this course all on my own.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: I wish I could have this man's job. He has multiple online sections, but does not teach at all, just collects a check.
